title: Collecting Soil Samples | From the Ground Up

tasks.task: Taking a soil sample for testing
subtasks: Determine the correct depth for soil sampling (top four to six inches)
Collect soil from a specific area (e.g., a 20-foot raised bed)
Mix the collected soil thoroughly
Use a container (bucket) to hold the mixed soil
Let the soil dry before sealing
Transfer the dried soil to a quart bag
Ensure the bag does not contain plant material or organic matter
Mail the soil sample to a laboratory
